author: jimbrooke
body:
Fixes for filters that are used to select fat events based on L1 event number.  Previously used 24 bit L1 event number from DAQ header.  Now uses 64 bit L1 event number from TCDS FED 1024.

NB - option "useFED1024L1Count" in HLTL1NumberFilter must be used with fedId=1024
title: Fat event filter fixes
